author: CTV News
title: Ground News - Protesters block access to Port of Vancouver calling for arms embargo on Israel
text: - Protesters in Vancouver are calling for Canada to end all arms trade with Israel, citing the need to abide by international and domestic law. - The Port of Vancouver is Canada's largest, generating billions of dollars in GDP and facilitating trade of about $305 billion in goods annually. Insights by Ground AI Does this summary seem wrong? 20 Articles 20 Articles All Left Center Right [] Winnipeg Free Press Gaza protesters blockade truck access to Port of Vancouver VANCOUVER – Dozens of protesters with Palestinian flags and banners have blockaded truck access to the Port of Vancouver. The Vancouver Fraser Port Authority says officials are “aware of protest […] 10 hours ago·Winnipeg, CanadaRead Full Article [] The Epoch Times Gaza Protesters Blockade Truck Access to Port of Vancouver Dozens of protesters with Palestinian flags and banners have blockaded truck access to the Port of Vancouver.
